summary: Tested Team Evaluation Dashboard and Optimizations with reason_note feature. All 12 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified: Team Evaluation page loads with stats, Top Contributors table with scores, Status Distribution and Activity Types charts render correctly, Add Optimization modal shows reason_note field with 20+ char validation working.

backend_api: GET /api/v3/team-evaluation/summary has all required fields (period_start, period_end, total_optimizations, by_status, by_activity_type, by_observed_impact, total_complaints, top_contributors, most_complained_users)
Top contributors include score field (0-5 range)
GET /api/v3/optimization-activity-types returns list of activity types
Activity types have required fields (id, name, is_default/usage_count)
Default activity types exist (Backlink Campaign, On-Page Optimization, etc.)
Creating optimization with short reason_note (<20 chars) returns 400/422
Creating optimization with valid reason_note (20+ chars) returns 200
GET optimizations include reason_note field in response
frontend_ui: Summary stats cards display: Total Optimizations (3), Completed (3), Total Complaints (2), Reverted (0)
Top Contributors table shows with data-testid='top-contributors-table'
Top contributor 'Super Admin' shows score 4.0 with 'Good' status badge
Activity Types bar chart renders (Backlink, Onpage)
'Attention Required: Users with Complaints' section displays users with complaints
Optimizations tab loads with existing optimizations
Add Optimization modal opens with reason_note field
reason_note field has character count indicator (0 / 20+ chars)
reason_note field shows amber highlight with warning text about Telegram notification
Create button DISABLED when reason_note is empty
Create button DISABLED when reason_note < 20 chars
Create button ENABLED when reason_note >= 20 chars
Character count updates dynamically (81 / 20+ chars shown)
Optimization cards display 'Alasan:' prefix with reason_note value

critical_code_review_comments: TeamEvaluationPage.jsx properly implements recharts for visualizations (PieChart, BarChart)
Team evaluation summary API correctly aggregates optimization data by user with scoring formula
OptimizationsTab.jsx implements reason_note validation: min 20 chars, required for new optimizations
Character count indicator properly shows current/minimum chars
Create button disabled state correctly tied to form validation
reason_note field displays on optimization cards with 'Alasan:' prefix
API validation properly returns 400 for missing/short reason_note
seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Used existing test data with 3 optimizations, 2 complaints.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Team Evaluation Dashboard fully tested. The page at /reports/team-evaluation displays performance metrics for SEO team members with score calculation. Add Optimization modal now has mandatory reason_note field (min 20 chars) that shows character count and validation state. The reason_note appears on optimization cards prefixed with 'Alasan:'. API endpoints /api/v3/team-evaluation/summary and /api/v3/optimization-activity-types are working correctly. Navigation to network detail uses /groups/{network_id} path.
